title: Verify in  the best available page, selection guide is not appears in hold code management

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Pre requisite:
1.Create an event.
2.Navigate to event access tab and select "Can Use Hold Code Mode" and deselect  "Can Use Any/All Seat Selection" in general options.
3.Apply changes
2. 1.Launch the application using 
2.Login with valild credentials
3. Navigate to ticket sales portal and select the created event
4. Navigate to all hold code tab and 
verify available seats for available hold code types
5. In best available select selection guide and enter quantity of seats
6. 1.Click on upper left hold code mode
2.Enter no of seats request
7. Click on upper left hold code mode
8. Select a hold code type and click on apply changes
9. Navigate to all hold code tab and verify the no of seats in the selected hold code
10. Logout the appliction
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Pre-requisite should be satisfied
2. User should be able to login successfully
3. user should be able to select the event
4. user should be displayed available seats for available hold codes
5. User should be able to enter the quantity of seats
6. 1.Application should forget the quantity of seats enter before in selection guide and should display the "set command" tab alone.
2.User should be able to enter no of seat request
7. Hold code mangement of the corresponding event should be displayed
8. Selected seats should be assigned to the corresponding holdcode
9. Available seats should be increased
10. Application should be logged out successfully

title: Verify whether Unexpected Error is displayed when page is refreshed after validation error is hit in Hold Code Management Search page.
custom_preconds:
Login to PVNG
https://pvqaf4.provenueapp.com:18443

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Navigate to Hold code management

2. Click on events tab 

3. Click FIND without entering any search criteria -
4. Refresh page
5. Click BACK 
6. Select hold code management from Ticketing menu
Select Advanced Search
7. Enter invalid date(do not fill any other fields) and click FIND: Valid error message is displayed
8. Refresh page:
9. Navigate to Hold Code Management > Package Tab
Click FIND - Error message is not displayed, and search results are returned
Expected result: Valid error message should be displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Success
2. Success
3.  Valid error message is returned
4.  Error retained
5. Search page should be displayed  
6. Success
7. Success
8.  Error retained
9. Error message is not displayed, and search results are returned
Expected result: Valid error message should be displayed
